|brand = Netgear |model = Orbi Router |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RBR40 |wlclass = AC22003R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, wireless system |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY316400362, PY317400404 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = 2976551502 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4019; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 716 <!-- 716 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, Bluetooth 4.1, DFS (master) |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;SKY, 2623L, 605EF;;2; ,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR);CSR8811;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2024 |fccapprovdate = 03/02/2017 |estreldate = 03/28/2017 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833122742 |asin = B06XJNDYX8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 400 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 866 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9886; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 2 |rad3rxchains = 2 |rad3sstreams = 2 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad3ac = 866 |rad3n = 300 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''802.11ac Two-Stream Wave2 WiFi plus Dedicated Two-Stream Wireless Backhaul''
"2976551502" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos (OEM [[Delta Networks]])
*Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK30): Orbi Router (RBR40) + Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30) *Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK40): Orbi Router (RBR40) + Orbi Satellite (RBS40) *Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK43): Orbi Router (RBR40) + 2x Orbi Satellite (RBS40)
A new FCC entry (PY317400404) dated 02/27/2018 removes bluetooth support. :Setup GUI available at http://orbilogin.com when connected via Wi-Fi.
===Product features=== *Dedicated two stream 802.11ac wireless backhaul *4 GB of flash is claimed by Netgear
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/275-netgear-orbi-wifi-system-rbk30/ ''NETGEAR Orbi WiFi System (RBK30)'' gallery on '''OpenITforum''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_rbr40 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==See also== *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Router'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' • ''Orbi Kit (RBK50)'' :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Outdoor Satellite (RBS50Y)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR40)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Router'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS40)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] *[[Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk50.aspx RBK50]) - AC3000 (RBR50 + RBS50) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk40.aspx RBK40]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBS40) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk30.aspx RBK30]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBW30)
